text: La Plata County is one of the 64 counties in the U.S. state of Colorado. As of the 2020 census, the population was 55,638. The county seat is Durango. The county was named for the La Plata River and the La Plata Mountains. "La plata" means "the silver" in Spanish. La Plata County was founded in 1874. == References == Category:1870s establishments in Colorado Territory Category:1874 establishments in the United States Category:Colorado counties
title: La Plata County, Colorado
